name: Graveyard: The Shift
description:
Hello there!

This is my first actually proper game submitted, I submitted another Rocket Booster game a while ago, that I lost the files for so I was never able to update it properly as I wanted, and wanted to go to this game instead and practice and make a proper game myself that I could enjoy playing and going around with. So far after quite a bit of time working, due to a personal life aswell and having to learn and study it all I've finally come to a partially satisfying conclussion that I can start showing off the game. There are still A LOT to go within this game, such as a Playermode, custom hud icons, custom item models, a better UI for health, animations and such but this is a beginning!

What is this game?;

The official name of the game is Graveyard: The Shift, The game is a short horror game, you're a young man who has just gotten work at a Graveyard, doing the literal graveyard shift, however what you haven't been told is how the dead comes to live after a certain amount of time of walking around the graveyard, your objective is to find the bible which you can use to curse the demons/creatures away for a certain amount of time, before they come back. Initially the point of the game is for you to stay alive for 10 minutes, or you will lose.

Current Features;

- Chat commands(Will be listed below, together with keybinds and controls)
- Inventory System
- Day and Night time System
- Flashlight System
- Bible to exorcise creature(s)

Upcoming Features;

- 5 Days of work to complete the game fully
- A richer storyline with background Story
- Randomized item locations
- Bigger map with more buildings and open area
- Optimized Gameplay
- Fixed Animations
- Proper playermodel rather than the current TicTac I have right now
- Better and more voice acting
- Friendbased Coop(Maybe?)

- Settings for Mouse sensitivity;

- Visual Settings

- Keybind Settings

- Fix enemy movement problems

- Richer story line

- More voice acting with more and better voice actors(Next update probably!)

- Create a more welcoming UI

- Create a more welcoming Menu and Pause Menu

- Fix Double Jumps

- More variety of buildings and open area to walk around in!

- More tools to do needy stuff!

- And much more!

Keybinds and Chat commands;

Current Keybinds;

WASD - Basic movement back forth, side to side.
Spacebar - Making your character jump

E - Pick up the Flashlight(Only object beside that bible for rn which is picked up by a button as shown in video)

F - Toggle on and off flashlight when it's in your hand
Escape - Open the temporary little pause menu created, that will also pause the game

T - Open the chatbox, remember to click on it first though for it to work properly

Number 1 - If archieved will take out Flashlight or put it away

Number 2 - If archieved will take out Bible or put it awa
